extension.name: org.apache.nifi.reporting.ambari.AmbariReportingTask
extension.description: Publishes metrics from NiFi to Ambari Metrics Service (AMS). Due to how the Ambari Metrics Service works, this reporting task should be scheduled to run every 60 seconds. Each iteration it will send the metrics from the previous iteration, and calculate the current metrics to be sent on next iteration. Scheduling this reporting task at a frequency other than 60 seconds may produce unexpected results.

property.name: Metrics Collector URL
property.description: The URL of the Ambari Metrics Collector Service

property.name: Application ID
property.description: The Application ID to be included in the metrics sent to Ambari

property.name: Hostname
property.description: The Hostname of this NiFi instance to be included in the metrics sent to Ambari

property.name: Process Group ID
property.description: If specified, the reporting task will send metrics about this process group only. If not, the root process group is used and global metrics are sent.
